root.name: Bad Bots
root.description: Sam McRae is a mechanic on the space cargo ship "Titan Hauler". Awakening from his cryosleep, he finds that the ship's robot crew has been reprogrammed to kill all humans, and the ship has been re-routed for a crash collision with Earth. Sam must fight his way through thousands of robots and prevent the Titan Hauler from wiping out the planet.
